definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to compare/to dispute/compared to/(before adj.) relatively/comparatively/rather/also pr. [jiao3]

sentences.english: Many women even prefer foreplay to actual sex and orgasm.
sentences.chinese: 相较于真实的性爱和高潮，很多女性更喜性前戏。

sentences.english: And what is the advantage your puppets would have over living dancers?
sentences.chinese: 而相较于活的舞者你的木偶的优势又是什么呢？

sentences.english: The front and rear tracks have been increased by 59 mm compared to the hatchback.
sentences.chinese: 前后轮距也分别增加了59毫米，相较于掀背车。

sentences.english: It has different aspects with existing anti-collision algorithms now.
sentences.chinese: 此方法相较于目前现有演算法有不同之观点。

sentences.english: That is really quite low relative to the gross flows in and out of unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 相较于失业人数总的流入与流出，这的确是相当低的。

sentences.english: They are more closely related to kangaroos than they are to bears.
sentences.chinese: 相较于熊类，牠们在血源上还比较接近袋鼠。

sentences.english: I think glam as much an attitude as it an aesthetic.
sentences.chinese: 我认为华丽相较于美学它更像是一种态度。

sentences.english: So they were still at lower weights than when they started.
sentences.chinese: 不过与他们开始研究时相较还是保持在较轻的重量。

sentences.english: The pontiff sounded more like a Western politician than a religious leader.
sentences.chinese: 相较于宗教领袖，教宗的话听起来更像一个西方政客。

definition: to compare/to dispute/compared to/(before adj.) relatively/comparatively/rather/also pr. [jiao3]
inferior (often in the combination 毫無遜色|毫无逊色, not in the least inferior)
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: not to be inferior in any aspects (idiom)/to surpass/to outdo/(derog.) to be even worse
pinyin: you3 guo4 zhi1 er2 wu2 bu4 ji2

definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
